description: The Area Plan for the East is given the go-ahead despite being earlier withdrawn due to objections.
title: Isle of Man housing plan approved despite concerns
title_page: Isle of Man housing plan approved despite concerns - BBC News
maintext: Claire Barber MHK successfully moved an amendment which called for an update of the island's strategic plan by the end of 2023, taking the island's climate change policies into account, and the drafting of an all-island area plan by the end of 2025.
